articles.content: Nathan Lyon's five-for helped Australia bowl out Sri Lanka for 212, before the hosts hit back with three wickets in a fast-moving opening Test on Wednesday. The tourists reached 98 for three at stump… [+2773 chars]

articles.title: Mark Appel makes MLB debut, pitches scoreless ninth for Phillies - USA TODAY
articles.description: Mark Appel, the first overall pick in the 2013 draft, made his MLB debut Wednesday night for the Phillies and pitched a scoreless ninth inning.
articles.content:
